$interpreted: Shirley: Professor Morris passed away!?
Charle: Yes... Quite a while ago too...
Charle: I've seen you before. You were a student of Morris. Is there something I can help you with?
Infant: Waah~~ Waah~
Charle: Is he your child?
Charle: Hmm? His hair...
Shirley: Professor Ceres, I'm on my way to handle some problems. I can't bring him with me. Can you please help me take care of him for just one day?
Charle: But...

Shirley: I will definitely come back for him!
Please... I don't have anyone else to ask anymore...

Mean Male Student: Elio, dear son of Headmaster Ceres.
Heard that you broke your rune medium during class today?
Kind Female Student: Stop it!
Elio: ... I have to leave now. Headmaster has summoned me to his office.

Mean Male Student: Ooh, so you're going to ask daddy to give you a new rune medium?
I'm so jealous of you privileged folks...
Annie: ELIO!!
Elio: Sis Annie... Is something wrong?
Annie: I heard that the rune item you use to cast arcane magic was broken. If you don't mind, I have a new one here...
Betty: Elio!
Cara: Elio!
Betty: I heard that your rune item was broken. I got a new one for you. Give it a try!
Cara: My father gave me an additional rune medium that's custom-made. I'll let you borrow it for now!
Betty: The quality of mine is the best! Use mine!
Annie: No! Mine's the best! I'll prove it to you right here with a duel!
Cara: Do your worst!
Charle: Why are you looking so startled? Did something happen?
Elio: N, nothing serious...
Elio: Is there something headmaster wants me to do?
Charle: From what I've heard, your rune medium broke, didn't it?
Charle: I believe that this should be very suitable for you.
Elio: This is... Did father specifically prepare this as a gift for me!?
Elio: Didn't you say that in order to avoid suspicion and maintain fairness, in Rune Academy, you'll treat me like you treat every other student?
Charle: In all honesty, this is...
Betty: Woah! You can't go inside there!
Charle: What's all this about!?
Annie: We just wanted to test and see who's rune medium is the best and most deserving as a present!
Betty: So, we decided to try to control one of the test creatures using arcane magic...
Cara: The results... well, you can see it right now!
Elio: Look out! He's coming!
Annie: Understood...
Betty: We'll go back to our dorms and write the apology letters...
Cara: Headmaster, see you tomorrow...
Charle: Elio, how does that quill feel?
Elio: It feels perfect and very easy to use. Father, thank you for the gift!
Charle: In all honesty... this is something left behind by your birth mother.
Charle: Back then, she seemed to be in some serious hardships and was out of options. Therefore, she had to ask me to take care of you temporarily.
Charle: This quill is an item she left by your side before she entrusted you to me.
Elio: Then... she disappeared... forever...

Elio: And I had to cut off my glowing strand of hair... 
All to cover up my identity as an illegitimate child of some random noble...
